ygData.subject: Pioneer an exciting new online experience!
ygData.msgSnippet: Are you tired of hanging around waiting for monsters to spawn? Do you like getting to know other players instead of killing them? Then we are looking for you!
ygData.messageBody:
Are you tired of hanging around waiting for monsters to spawn? Do
you like getting to know other players instead of killing them? Then
we are looking for you! Our team is recruiting market research
study participants for an exciting new kind of online community.

The market research study will take place in the evenings from
August 14th to August 24th. If chosen, you will connect from home
using your PC and join many others in a unique online experience.

Sound intriguing? If so, go to

http://www.groupmango.com/default.html?src=yhevrt717

and complete a brief survey to sign up!

After you complete the survey, we'll get back to you via email with
more information.

Charlotte Nelson
Group Mango
